price: اى اهل كتابو! ولې حق د باطل سره ګډوئ؟ او حق پټوئ او حال دا چې تاسو (ښه) پوهېږئ.
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَلۡبِسُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima talbisūna al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumūna al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
